nodes.documentation:
@title whitelist implementation which manages KYC approvals for the org.
@dev modeled after ERC-1404
nodes.name: Whitelist

nodes.documentation: Emits when an operator KYC approves (or revokes) a trader.
nodes.name: Approve
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows the owner of this contract to approve (or deny)
a trader's account.
nodes.name: approve
authorizeTransfer

authorizeTransfer(address,address,uint25.details: This call will revert when the transfer is not authorized. This is a mutable call to allow additional data to be recorded, such as when the user aquired their tokens.

initialize(address).details: Done with `initialize` instead of a constructor in order to support using this contract via an Upgradable Proxy.

devdoc.title: whitelist implementation which manages KYC approvals for the org.

approve(address,bool).notice: Allows the owner of this contract to approve (or deny) a trader's account.

authorizeTransfer(address,address,uint25.notice: Called by the DAT contract before a transfer occurs.

initialize(address).notice: Called once to complete configuration for this contract.
